title: UK election: final polls
author: VD
content_html:
We’ll see if they do any better than they did on Brexit.

Con: 43.7% (+5.9)
Lab: 36.1% (+4.9)
LDem: 8.1% (-)
UKIP: 4.4% (-8.5)
Grn: 2.2% (-1.6)



Labour, the LibDems, and UKIP all look too high to me.
